timeline.author: highker

timeline.bodyText: Add javadoc to denote there should be no explicit call on this method.
timeline.author: highker

timeline.bodyText: nit: what about from or fromBufferResult?  This seems to be the convention for factory method name in Presto, for example, see RowType::from, FieldId::from, etc :)
timeline.author: wenleix

timeline.message:
Create ThriftBufferResult and ThriftSerializedPage

Make SerializedPage independent of thrift serialization.

Create ThriftBufferResult and ThriftSerializedPage
